task.title: Step 3. Install the New Version
task.shortdesc: Install the new version of the RPM package.

step.cmd: Use the following URL to download the RPM zip file from the StreamSets website: .
Use the following command to extract the zip file to a different directory than the previous version:

info.p: For example, to extract version 2.0.0.0, use the following command:unzip streamsets-datacollector-2.0.0.0-all-rpms.zip

step.cmd: To install the full RPM package and all available stage libraries, use the following command:
Or, to install the core RPM package and then install individual stage libraries as needed, use the following command:
step.info: yum localinstall streamsets-datacollector-<version>-1.noarch.rpmFor example, to install version 2.0.0.0, use the following command:yum localinstall streamsets-datacollector-2.0.0.0-1.noarch.rpm
